title: Inu Kitarinaba Haru Toukaraji
alternative_title: With The Dog Comes The Spring ; 犬来たりなば春遠からじ
status: With The Dog Comes The Spring ; 犬来たりなば春遠からじ
description:
Description :
        In a world of humans and beastfolk...After Masora, a human college student, discovers that his best friend may have not actually been his friend at all, he starts to feel insecure about how naive and inept he is.In hopes of improving himself as a person, he decides to start working at a ski resort part-time.That's where he meets another part-time worker, a husky-hybrid beastman around the same age named Kohaku.From the moment they meet, Masora feels that Kohaku is a cold, terrifying man, and he begins to worry that he won't be able to survive his new part-time job, until one day...A love story between an unsociable beastman and a clumsy human.
